name: 東方縦笛永夜抄
summary:
Originals:
    01: Eternal Night Vignette ~ Eastern Night
    02: Illusionary Night ~ Ghostly Eyes & Stirring an Autumn Moon ~ Mooned Insect
    03: Deaf to all but the Song & Song of the Night Sparrow ~ Night Bird
    04: Nostalgic Blood of the East ~ Old World & Plain Asia
    05: Retribution for the Eternal Night ~ Imperishable Night
    06: Maiden's Capriccio ~ Dream Battle
    07: Love-Colored Master Spark
    08: Cinderella Cage ~ Kagome-Kagome
    09: Lunatic Eyes ~ Invisible Full Moon
    10: Gensokyo Millennium ~ History of the Moon & Flight of the Bamboo Cutter ~ Lunatic Princess
    11: Voyage 1970
    12: Reach for the Moon, Immortal Smoke & Extend Ash ~ Hourai Victim
